item.title: Let's talk about smart home accessibility
item.description: I define accessibility as a critical necessity to be inclusive to everyone. No matter how big or small the task, anyone should be able complete the task at hand regardless of the disability (e.g., vision, hearing, mobility, device access, etc). You might be wondering what does this have to do with smart homes and why should I think or care about this? I think there are a few simple facts to consider:
